name: Shoemageddon
description:
(Epilepsy Warning) One room in this game has bright flashing lights. It's a large hallway with moving textures.

What's that sound coming from downstairs? Grab your cameras and take a trip into this short and bizarre adventure.

Created for the 2021 Brackeys Game Jam.

Programming by Carl Bernardo and Callum Jago

Models by Curtis Paulk

Music and Sound by Caleb Oosterling
